attributes.review: Please delete the app!! I downloaded this app to try to find out information about Donald Trump and it was so disappointing there was no real facts everything was fake news. Apple please delete the app it doesn’t work, it kept making my phone crash there’s so many bugs in this terrible app it deserves negative stars!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Gross hate this app, most revolting thing I’ve seen this week 🤢 -69/10 stars. Delete it
attributes.title: Don’t be shy, delete it 🥰

attributes.review: WORST APP EVER I WISH I COULD GIVE ZERO OUT OF FIVE TRUMP IS TRASH REMOVE THIS APP TRUMP IS POOP 💩

attributes.review: I DIDNT EVEN OPEN THE APP AND IT FELT TOXIC HE RLLY THOUGHT HE DID SUM🙈 I HOPE HE NEVER DOES IT AGAIN✨HES BANNING TIKTOK BECAUSE NO ONE CAME TO THE RALLY BUT IN REALITY NO ONE LIKES HIM HES SEXIST, RACIST, AND THE LIST GOES ON I RLLY HOPE HIS APP GETTING REMOVED IS A SIGN THAT HE SHOULD NEVER UNDERESTIMATE GEN-Z AGAIN BECAUSE WE WILL BE THE CHANGE 😌🤚
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🤢🤮

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see how trump runs his information outreach and to say the least, it is extremely reflective of the time he has spent in office. Hardly works and does the absolute bare minimum. I would NOT recommend this app to anyone.
attributes.title: Gross bad
